title: Podaa Podi Kadhalai Lyrics Podaa Podi Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Podaa Podi Kadhalai
Singers: Benny Dayal and Andrea Jeremiah
Movie: Poda Podi
Music: Dharan
Lyrics : Na.Muthukumar

Other Songs Lyrics

    Chinna chinna poigalaal thollaye illai
    dhinam dhinam kanavilae nee vara villai

iruvarin rasanaigal inaindhadhe illai
oru kudai pidithu naam nadandhadhe illai

penne penne nee ennai kollaadhae
aiyyo aiyyo naan sethu
pizhaikindraen  (2)

podaa podi kadhalai kadhalikuren
podaa podi kadhalai kadhalikuren
podaa podi kadhalai kadhalikuren
podaa podi kadhali

Julay'il peidhidum mudhal mazhai polae
poigalaai pozhikiraai ennidam neeye

unkannilae oru unmayai naan
parthadhae illai
un kadhalil ulla unmaiyai naan
unarndhadhaal thollai

kaadhal kondadhaal than
pala maatram kandeno
indha vazhvai naanum nesikindraenae

podaa podi kadhalai kadhalikuren
podaa podi kadhalai kadhalikuren
podaa podi kadhalai kadhalikuren
podaa podi kadhali

Our love is everlasting
i can't wait to see
what the next day will mean to me

pennae pennae idhu pidikudhe
ennai marandhu manam ponadhae
yeno naan unnai thaedinen
kadhal endru adhil odinen

ooooh..kadhal oru naal en vasal vandhadhe
ullae azhaithaen vandhu ennai kolludhey
konjam valithalum inikindradhe ...

iruvarum kavidhaiyai varigalai polae
ninaivilae nirkiraai azhagiya theeye

iruvarin rasanaigal inaindadhe illai
oru kudai pidithu naam
nadandhadhe illai

penne penne nee
ennai kollaadhae
aiyyo aiyyo naan sethu
